biotools.summary: Tripal MegaSearch is a tool for downloading biological data stored in a Tripal/Chado database. Site administrators may choose from two different data sources to serve data, i.e. Tripal MegaSearch materialized views (MViews) or Chado base tables. If neither data source is desired, administrators may also create their own MViews and serve them through Tripal MegaSearch. Site administrators can also set download limits according to their server's capability.
